name: database-server
description: Comprehensive database server supporting PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite with natural language SQL query capabilities. Enables AI agents to interact with databases through both direct SQL and natural language queries.
author: Souhardya Kundu

tools.name: query_database
tools.description: Execute natural language queries against the database

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all available tables in the database

tools.name: describe_table
tools.description: Get detailed schema information for a specific table

tools.name: execute_sql
tools.description: Execute raw SQL queries with safety checks

tools.name: connect_to_database
tools.description: Connect to a new database with provided credentials

tools.name: get_connection_examples
tools.description: Get example connection strings for different database types

tools.name: get_current_database_info
tools.description: Get information about the currently connected database
